project_descr: Project is aimed at establishment and positioning of the Centre for Sustainable Development (CSD), as a joint initiative of Government of Montenegro and UNDP, with aim to promote sustainable development in Montenegro, within the EU framework.

outputs.output_descr: Establishment and positioning of the Centre for Sustainable Development, as a joint initiative of Government of Montenegro and UNDP, with aim to promote sustainable development in Montenegro, within the EU framework.

project_title: establishment of center for sustainable development
